entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
